channel.title: The Waggleton P. Tallylicker appreciation thread.
channel.description:
Anyone to have purchased Bulletstorm will by now know the pain of losing this great ally, he was champion, a scholar and a hero. He was Waggleton P. Tallylicker, a giant robot dinosaur with laser beams attached to his face, and he will be remembered. :'(
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-CpciBEKt9k[/url]

item.title: The Waggleton P. Tallylicker appreciation thread.
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
I was thinking of writing something in the Bulletstorm thread and dedicating the post to him, but by the time I finally pulled away from Bulletstorm I couldn’t remember his name. Guess a whole thread works too.

Waggleton P. Tallylicker, you shall be missed.

Read full topic
item.source: The Waggleton P. Tallylicker appreciation thread.

item.title: The Waggleton P. Tallylicker appreciation thread.
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Best level of the game from what I’ve played so far.

He will always be remembered.

Read full topic
item.source: The Waggleton P. Tallylicker appreciation thread.
